reference.title: Migrating to release 2.5
reference.shortdesc: In DITA-OT 2.5, several frequently-overridden legacy style settings were removed from the default PDF plug-in. A separate org.dita.pdf2.legacy plug-in can be used to restore the original settings.

section.note: This topic provides a summary of changes in DITA-OT 2.5 that may require modifications to custom stylesheets or plug-ins. For more information on changes in this release, see the .

section.title: Legacy PDF styling moved to external plug-in
section.p: Several legacy styles have been modified or removed in the default PDF plug-in org.dita.pdf2, including the following:

ul.li: Task topics with a single step are now rendered as simple blocks (rather than as lists without labels).
Table containers now inherit the initial indentation (start-indent) from the parent elements.
Indentation has been removed from example elements.
Titles for related link lists have been standardized to use bold font weight.
Several remaining occurrences of left/right borders, margins, padding, and text alignment now use the corresponding start/end equivalents to better support right-to-left languages.

section.p: Users that rely on these settings for their own customizations may install the org.dita.pdf2.legacy plug-in to restore the pre–2.5 styles if necessary.
section.note: Run dita --install https://github.com/dita-ot/org.dita.pdf2.legacy/archive/develop.zip to install the plug-in and restore the pre–2.5 styles.
